translation.en: [narrator] Once upon a time, there was a baker from Chicago.
translation.de: Es war einmal eine Bäckerin aus Chicago.

translation.en: Merry Christmas.
[narrator] That's me, Stacy,
who looks just like Margaret, the duchess of Montenaro.
translation.de: die wie Margaret aussieht, die Herzogin von Montenaro.

translation.en: Stacy, me again, married the handsome Prince Edward at Christmas,
translation.de: Stacy, also ich, heiratete den schönen Prinz Edward an Weihnachten,

translation.en: while Margaret married my adorable best friend Kevin
translation.de: und Margaret heiratete meinen besten Freund Kevin,

translation.en: right before she was crowned queen of Montenaro,
translation.de: kurz bevor sie zur Königin von Montenaro gekrönt wurde.

translation.en: which almost didn't happen,
because her cousin Fiona, who looks like both of us
translation.de: Denn ihre Cousine Fiona, die wie wir aussieht

translation.en: and is so over-the-top…
[Stacy] …impersonated her in an attempt to steal the throne.
translation.de: …gab sich für sie aus, um den Thron zu stehlen.

translation.en: Luckily, Fiona was caught and sentenced to many years of community service.
translation.de: Zum Glück wurde Fiona geschnappt und zu gemeinnütziger Arbeit verurteilt.

translation.en: I thought she should go to jail, but Margaret says she's family.
translation.de: Weil sie zur Familie gehört, bewahrte Margaret sie vor dem Knast.

translation.en: [chuckles] Could Christmas get any more eventful?
-Well, maybe. -[sirens wail]
Because this year, I'm cochairing
translation.de: Dieses Jahr veranstalte ich ein internationales Weihnachtsfestival

translation.en: an international Christmas festival with Margaret,
translation.de: Dieses Jahr veranstalte ich ein internationales Weihnachtsfestival mit Margaret, meiner allerbesten Freundin.

translation.en: who's just about my best friend in the world.
And to commemorate the occasion,
translation.de: Und um den Anlass zu feiern,

translation.en: the Vatican has loaned us the Star of Peace,
translation.de: hat uns der Vatikan den Stern des Friedens geliehen.

translation.en: a priceless relic that once belonged to Saint Nicholas himself.
translation.de: Ein unbezahlbares Relikt, das einst dem Heiligen Nikolaus gehörte.

translation.en: The Star will be kept under guard until it goes on top of a ginormous tree
translation.de: Der Stern wird bewacht, bis er auf einen riesigen Baum kommt,

translation.en: at our tree-lighting ceremony on Christmas Eve.
Oh, and that's Cardinal Amoah, the special emissary from the Vatican.
translation.de: Und das ist Kardinal Amoah, der Sonderbotschafter des Vatikans.

translation.en: Oh, this is so huge!
Can you believe this?
It's incredible.
I feel like we're making history.
Because you are making history.
Your Royal Majesty, Your Highness,
I present to you the Star of Peace.
translation.de: ich präsentiere Euch den Stern des Friedens.

translation.en: No one's getting paid a dime. It all goes to charity.
translation.de: Niemand wird bezahlt. Alles wird gespendet.

translation.en: Yes, we had a cancellation, so there's one final audition to fill the spot in the program.
translation.de: Ja, es gab eine Absage, also gibt es ein letztes Vorsprechen.

translation.en: [Kevin] Okay. Bye.
Stacy and I are handling the details ourselves, so we'll be there.
translation.de: Stacy und ich kümmern uns um die Details, also sind wir da.

translation.en: All right, thank you for checking. Bye.
[exhales] That's the last call I'm taking tonight. Me too.
Oh, except for this one. Hey, Liv!
translation.de: Bis auf das hier. Hey, Liv!

translation.en: -Merry Christmas! -Merry Christmas.
Mm, we miss you, darling. How were exams?
translation.de: Wir vermissen dich. Wie liefen die Prüfungen?

translation.en: [Olivia] A major pain.
I love the ballet academy, don't get me wrong,
but they make you work really hard on the school part.
translation.de: aber der Schulteil ist echt anstrengend.

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing you can't handle.
Are you on your way to the airport?
That's why I called. JFK's closed because of the weather.
translation.de: Deswegen rufe ich an. JFK hat wegen des Wetters zu.

translation.en: The chaperone says we might leave from Bradley.
translation.de: Aber vielleicht fliegen wir von Bradley.

translation.en: Oh. Well, keep us posted.
I love you. I love you more.
I'll sleep better once I know she's here. Yeah. You and me both.
translation.de: -Ich schlafe besser, sobald sie hier ist. -Ja. Ich auch.

translation.en: Come here.
[Edward] Very good, Your Majesty.
Margaret and I love working together. Yeah, I'm sure we'll do it again.
translation.de: Margaret und ich arbeiten gern zusammen. Wir werden das wiederholen.

translation.en: It's just right now we kinda have our hands full.
translation.de: Gerade sind wir bloß sehr beschäftigt.

translation.en: We would love to see the corgis as well.
translation.de: Wir würden gern die Corgis sehen.

translation.en: -Absolutely. You can quote me. -Yes. And a very Merry Christmas to you.
-Thank you so much. Bye. -[Edward] Cheers.
Well, that makes 11 ambassadors, nine prime ministers, seven kings, four queens,
translation.de: Das macht 11 Botschafter, 9 Premierminister, 7 Könige, 4 Königinnen,

translation.en: an entire delegation from Penglia--
And a partridge in a pear tree?
-[sighs] Something like that. -[Stacy laughs]
I'm so glad I have you to help me with all this crazy last-minute stuff.
translation.de: Ich bin so froh, dass du mir mit diesem Chaos hilfst.

translation.en: We make a great team, don't we? Just like your dear old Chicago Red Sox.
translation.de: Wir sind ein tolles Team. Genau wie deine Chicago Red Sox.

translation.en: It's White Sox.
Yes, them as well. All the socks.
[choir] ♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪ ♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ We wish you a Merry Christmas ♪
♪ And a Happy New Year ♪
-Oh, bravo! -Fabulous.
-Thank you very much. -This way please, ladies and gentlemen.
Maybe we put them after the yodeler?
Do we really need a yodeler?
Well, we don't want to offend the Swiss ambassador.
We don't want to offend anyone.
[clicks tongue] Yeah.
I'm terribly sorry to interrupt, Your Majesty, but we have,
translation.de: Es tut mir leid, Euch zu unterbrechen, Eure Majestät,

translation.en: well, a bit of a situation.
translation.de: aber es gibt da ein Problem.

translation.en: This is Inspector Moretti, superintendent of police.
The police? Well, that sounds serious.
I'm afraid it is, Your Majesty.
[Stacy] The Star of Peace is gone.
translation.de: Der Stern des Friedens ist weg.

translation.en: [exhales] This can't be happening.
Isn't the museum vault under guard around the clock?
translation.de: Wird der Tresor nicht ständig bewacht?

translation.en: The guards were drugged.
We found traces of chloromethazine in the ventilation system that services the security office.
translation.de: Wir fanden Spuren von Chlormethazin im Belüftungssystem des Sicherheitsbüros.

translation.en: Surely there's surveillance footage.
The thieves wiped the hard drives clean.
Whoever did this came prepared.
We've notified Interpol, but with no forensic evidence, we've very little to go on.
translation.de: Interpol ist informiert, aber uns fehlen die Beweise.

translation.en: Just please promise us you'll get it back in time for the ceremony.
translation.de: Versprechen Sie uns, ihn bis zur Zeremonie zurückzubringen.

translation.en: I'm afraid that would be a piecrust promise.
Easily made, easily broken.
Oh dear!
We'd like to keep the investigation confidential until we know more.
translation.de: Die Ermittlungen bleiben vertraulich, bis wir mehr wissen.

translation.en: Well, shall we notify the cardinal?
Since it's possible the breach came from within Vatican security,
translation.de: Die Sicherheitslücke könnte vom Vatikan kommen,

translation.en: Interpol has asked us to hold off until we rule them out.
translation.de: also warten wir, bis das auszuschließen ist.

translation.en: Just know we're doing everything we can.
Well, thank you, Inspector.
[sighs] The relic of Saint Nicholas. I mean, this is an international scandal of epic proportions.
translation.de: Das Relikt des Heiligen Nikolaus. Das ist ein internationaler Skandal.

translation.en: [Kevin] Let's just try to stay calm, okay?
Yes, of course. [clears throat] Keep calm.
-I sympathize with you completely. -[sighs] Thank you.
But when the crown jewels of Belgravia were stolen, oh, my grandfather, the king, was nearly deposed.
translation.de: Beim Raub unserer Juwelen wurde mein Großvater, der König, fast entthront.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Not helping.
But the jewels were eventually recovered.
-Well, bits and pieces. -Ah.
A ruby here, a sapphire there, a diamond, you know.
translation.de: Ein Rubin hier, ein Saphir da, ein Diamant.

translation.en: Dude. Come on.
There must be something we can do.
translation.de: Wir müssen doch etwas tun können.

translation.en: -[exhales] -The police are handling it. They have no clues and no leads.
translation.de: -Die Polizei kümmert sich darum. -Sie haben keinerlei Spuren.

translation.en: Wait. If the police don't have any leads,
translation.de: Warte. Wenn die Polizei keine Spuren hat,

translation.en: then it's up to us to come up with something they haven't thought of.
translation.de: muss uns etwas einfallen, an das sie nicht gedacht haben.

translation.en: Like what?
Well, what we need is someone with information that the police don't have.
translation.de: Wir brauchen jemanden mit Informationen, die die Polizei nicht hat.

translation.en: Someone with connections to the black market,
and it wouldn't hurt if they were just a little bit crooked.
A little crooked?
Yes, indeed.
We need a person who actually thinks like a criminal,
translation.de: Wir brauchen jemanden, der wie ein Verbrecher denkt.

translation.en: who has a history of never considering consequences, and has absolutely no fear of breaking the rules.
translation.de: Jemand, der nie an Konsequenzen denkt und keine Angst hat, Regeln zu brechen.

translation.en: -If only we knew someone like that. -[both] Fiona.
If anyone knows the unseemly side of things, it's my cousin.
translation.de: Wenn jemand die böse Seite kennt, dann mein Cousine.

translation.en: [scoffs] I should know.
I'm sorry. Let me get this straight.
You want to employ the woman who, with the help of her cohorts,
translation.de: Ihr wollt die Frau einstellen, die sich mit ihrer Kohorte

translation.en: masqueraded as you in an attempt to take over the country?
translation.de: als du ausgegeben hat, um das Land zu erobern?

translation.en: Didn't she go to jail?
Fiona's serving a sentence of community service at St. Michael's Convent.
translation.de: Fiona leistet gemeinnützige Arbeit in St. Michaels Kloster.

translation.en: I was actually thinking of inviting her for Christmas before any of this happened.
translation.de: Noch bevor das passierte, wollte ich sie zu Weihnachten einladen.

translation.en: You were?
I've always felt sorry for her,
growing up in boarding schools with no one to look after her.
translation.de: Sie war im Internat, wo sich niemand um sie kümmerte.

translation.en: I think this past year at the convent's done her some good.
translation.de: Das letzte Jahr im Kloster hat ihr gutgetan.

translation.en: Not that much good.
Look, it's not like I trust Fiona,
but I mean, St. Michael's is less than an hour away,
translation.de: aber das Kloster ist weniger als eine Stunde entfernt,

translation.en: and the police are stumped.
It would be unconscionable to sit here and do nothing.
translation.de: Es wäre unvernünftig, hier zu sitzen und nichts zu tun.

translation.en: What have we got to lose?
You know, anything and everything that isn't nailed down, but… [sighs]
translation.de: Eigentlich alles, was nicht festgenagelt ist, aber…

translation.en: …I can't think of any other ideas, so…
[sighs] I'll start nailing things down.
[nun] You missed a spot.
Where?
[nun] The library.
You know, the place with the books.
[scoffs] It's time for my break.
[nun] Need I remind you, Fiona Pembroke,
translation.de: Muss ich dich daran erinnern, Fiona Pembroke,

translation.en: that you still owe 1,242 hours -of community service? -[watch beeps]
translation.de: dass du noch 12.042 Stunden Sozialdienst leisten musst?

translation.en: [nun] Be that as it may, Mother Superior wants to see you in her office.
translation.de: Wie dem auch sei, Mutter Oberin will dich sprechen.

translation.en: Now!
Savage.
The sisters and I are absolutely thrilled
translation.de: Die Schwestern und ich sind begeistert,

translation.en: Ms. Pembroke will be spending Christmas with you.
translation.de: dass Ms. Pembroke Weihnachten mit Euch verbringt.

translation.en: She's the only family I have left.
Well, and her mother, but I haven't seen my aunt in years.
translation.de: Und ihre Mutter, aber ich habe meine Tante ewig nicht gesehen.

translation.en: I do hope Fiona hasn't been too much trouble.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, Fiona macht keinen zu großen Ärger.

translation.en: We are all God's children, my dear. [chuckles]
translation.de: Wir sind alle Kinder Gottes, meine Liebe.

translation.en: What a scrumptious surprise.
Oh, you're looking well.
What brings you to my private little corner of purgatory?
translation.de: Und was führt dich in meine private Ecke des Fegefeuers?

translation.en: I thought it might be pleasant for us to have the holidays together.
translation.de: Ich dachte, es wäre schön, Weihnachten zusammen zu feiern.

translation.en: Oh. Will I be mopping or dusting?
translation.de: Muss ich wischen oder Staub putzen?

translation.en: [chuckles] You'll be our guest.
[Mother Superior] After, uh, prayerful consideration,
I've told Her Majesty I could allow a discrete bending of the rules, seeing as it's Christmas.
translation.de: sagte ich Ihrer Majestät, dass ich eine Ausnahme an Weihnachten erlaube.

translation.en: As long as you promise to return by December 26th.
translation.de: Solange Sie versprechen, bis zum 26. Dezember zurück zu sein.

translation.en: There's a hearing of the disciplinary committee
translation.de: Es gibt eine Anhörung des Disziplinarausschusses,

translation.en: for which you must be present.
translation.de: für die Sie anwesend sein müssen.

translation.en: We absolutely promise to have her back in time, Mother Superior.
translation.de: Wir versprechen, dass sie rechtzeitig zurück ist.

translation.en: You have my word.
[inhales] Well, in that case,
Ms. Pembroke is free to spend the holidays at the palace.
translation.de: kann Ms. Pembroke die Feiertage im Palast verbringen.

translation.en: Sounds like a gas.
Thank you, Inspector.
Yeah, keep us posted.
translation.de: Halten Sie uns auf dem Laufenden.

translation.en: Anything?
They thought they had a lead, but it didn't pan out.
[exhales] We could certainly use some good news right about now.
No worries, royal six-pack. Good news has arrived.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, königliches Sixpack. Ich bringe gute Nachrichten.

translation.en: Special delivery.
-Handle with care. -[Fiona] Hm.
[Stacy] Um, Reggie and Mindy? You gotta be kidding me.
translation.de: Reggie und Mindy? Ist das dein Ernst?

translation.en: Fiona agreed to help us, but she said she needed her squad.
translation.de: Fiona will uns helfen, aber sie braucht ihre Truppe.

translation.en: -Weren't they in jail as well? -[scoffs]
translation.de: Waren die nicht auch im Gefängnis?

translation.en: They were, but I, uh, pulled a few strings. [chuckles]
translation.de: Waren sie, aber ich habe meine Verbindungen spielen lassen.

translation.en: Well, it's good to be queen.
How's my fave cuzzie-in-law?
Fine, I guess.
I hope you ain't still sore over our little mix-up last Christmas.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, du bist nicht mehr sauer wegen der letzten Weihnachtsverwechslung.

translation.en: -Mix-up? -[Reggie] Yeah.
You kidnapped me! Okay. Still sore.
Spicy.
Why don't I have Mrs. Donatelli show you your rooms?
translation.de: Warum zeigt Mrs. Donatelli euch nicht eure Zimmer?

translation.en: This way. Please.
Meow.
Right, yes, uh,
meow to you as well.
-No respect. -[mouths] No.
None. Cool.
Am I late for brekkie? Only by an hour… or three.
translation.de: -Bin ich zu spät fürs Frühstück? -Nur eine oder drei Stunden.

translation.en: No worries. I couldn't eat a thing.
But I do have news. I've been in touch with an associate
translation.de: Aber ich habe Neuigkeiten. Ich hatte Kontakt zu einem Partner, der uns bei der Schatzsuche helfen könnte.

translation.en: who should be able to help us find our missing treasure.
translation.de: Ich hatte Kontakt zu einem Partner, der uns bei der Schatzsuche helfen könnte.

translation.en: [Margaret] Does this associate have a name?
I'd rather not say until he's on board, but trust me, he's the GOAT.
translation.de: Den sage ich, wenn er dabei ist, aber glaubt mir, er ist der BAZ.

translation.en: Sorry, he's… he's a goat?
translation.de: Tut mir leid, er ist was?

translation.en: "Greatest of all time," babe. It's like a sports thing.
I knew that. I… I knew that.
[Mindy] I bet it's that count from Barcelona.
[Reggie] Nah, he's a squirrelly one.
Never looks you square in the eye.
translation.de: Sieht dir nie direkt in die Augen.

translation.en: He's got a glass eye, idiot.
[inhales] I'll need to borrow a car,
and preferably a 'rari that matches my Manolos.
translation.de: Gern einen Ferrari, passend zu meinen Manolos.

translation.en: Don't worry. Frank will be happy to drive you.
Don't you trust me, royal boo?
[Stacy] Hell no.
And Bonnie and Clyde are staying right here just to make sure you come back.
translation.de: Und Bonnie und Clyde bleiben hier, damit du zurückkommst.

translation.en: -[scoffs] -Here? What are we supposed to do all day?
translation.de: Hier? Was sollen wir den ganzen Tag machen?

translation.en: Perhaps you could start by, uh, returning the silver.
Reggie!
What?
[sighs] Dear.
Right. Okay. Now look, I don't wish to be impertinent, Your Ladyship,
translation.de: Also gut. Ich will nicht unverschämt sein,

translation.en: but if you're not out in 20 minutes, I have strict orders to come in there and fetch.
translation.de: aber Sie haben 20 Minuten, bis ich Sie rechtmäßig holen muss.

translation.en: Bossy.
Remember! Twenty minutes!
You haven't lost your touch.
translation.de: Du bist immer noch der Alte.

translation.en: Some say.
You're looking well, Peter.
You too, Pemmie.
It's Pembroke.
You'll always be Pemmie to me.
So, how long has it been since you walked out on me that spring night in Barbados?
translation.de: Wie lange ist es her, dass du mich in Barbados stehengelassen hast?

translation.en: Oh, please.
We were always better as friends. Everything else was a complication.
translation.de: Wir waren als Freunde immer besser. Alles andere war zu kompliziert.

translation.en: That's an interesting word for it.
I heard from Bianca the other day.
Mummy's always had a soft spot for you since we were in nappies.
translation.de: Mummy hatte schon immer eine Schwäche für dich.

translation.en: She says you won't return her calls.
I have nothing to say.
[Peter] Oh, come on, Pemmie. It's Christmas.
translation.de: Komm schon, Pemmie. Es ist Weihnachten.

translation.en: Give the old girl a break.
If I remember, you weren't speaking to your father.
translation.de: Du hast zuletzt auch nicht mit deinem Vater gesprochen.

translation.en: No. I wasn't.
But I saw him last Christmas, two days before he passed.
translation.de: Aber ich sah ihn letzte Weihnachten, zwei Tage vor seinem Tod.

translation.en: And I'm very glad I did.
Well, now that we've limped down memory lane, can we talk business?
translation.de: Kommen wir nach diesem Trip in die Vergangenheit zum Geschäft.

translation.en: The Star of Peace.
You want my help getting it back.
Question is, why is it so important to you?
translation.de: Die Frage ist: Warum ist er dir so wichtig?

translation.en: [Fiona] Well, it's important to my cuzzie.
I treated her… [sighs] …unkindly,
so I thought I'd make it up to her.
translation.de: also sehe ich es als Wiedergutmachung.

translation.en: [chuckles] Yes, I heard about your little escapade.
So, will you help despite our colorful past?
translation.de: Hilfst du mir, nach allem, was passiert ist?

translation.en: You know the answer to that.
No matter what, no matter where?
Let me show you what I've dug up. [chuckles softly]
-Are you coming? -Mm.
Et voilà! The Interpol case file.
Interpol? I thought you left them.
translation.de: Interpol? Ich dachte, da wärst du weg.

translation.en: That doesn't mean I've forgotten how to get around their firewalls.
translation.de: Firewalls kann ich trotzdem noch umgehen.

translation.en: -Oh. -According to this report, there are no suspects in the theft,
translation.de: Es scheint keine Verdächtigen zu geben.

translation.en: but the interesting bit
is that chloromethazine was used to drug the guards.
translation.de: dass die Wachen mit Chlormethazin betäubt wurden.

translation.en: Why on earth is that interesting?
Interpol is utterly convinced
that the black-market supply is limited to an Asian distributor.
translation.de: dass nur ein asiatischer Händler illegal damit handelt.

translation.en: And it is,
except for one disreputable pharmacist in Geneva,
translation.de: Bis auf einen Apotheker in Genf,

translation.en: who runs an after-hours operation out of the back of his warehouse on Place du Port.
translation.de: der nach Feierabend aus seinem Lager am Place du Port verkauft.

translation.en: [inhales] Now, lucky for us,
there are security cameras all along the riverbank.
I searched through the last three days of footage and came up with this.
translation.de: Ich sah mir die Aufnahmen der letzten drei Tage an.

translation.en: That's Itai Krauss.
Do I know him?
Indirectly. He works for an old friend of yours.
translation.de: Indirekt. Er arbeitet für einen alten Freund von dir.

translation.en: -[computer beeps] -Hunter Cunard, the billionaire hotel tycoon.
Why would a hotel tycoon steal the Star of Peace?
translation.de: Warum sollte so jemand den Stern des Friedens stehlen?

translation.en: It's a little-known fact that Hunter's secret obsession is collecting precious items that aren't for sale.
translation.de: Nur wenige wissen, dass Hunter besessen von unverkäuflichen Wertgegenständen ist.

translation.en: Paintings, antiquities, jewels. He loves an impossible challenge.
translation.de: Gemälde, Antiquitäten, Juwelen. Er liebt unmögliche Herausforderungen.

translation.en: You've been an invaluable help, Mr. Maxwell.
I'm certain the police will be grateful for the information.
Maggie, don't be silly. You can't go to the police.
translation.de: Maggie, sei nicht albern. Du kannst nicht zur Polizei.

translation.en: Why not?
Hunter has friends everywhere.
One wrong word to the wrong person, and the Star disappears forever.
translation.de: Ein falsches Wort, und der Stern ist verloren.

translation.en: [scoffs] So, what do we do?
The only thing you can do.
You steal it back.
How?
Every Christmas, Hunter hosts an exclusive soiree at his estate.
translation.de: Jedes Jahr veranstaltet Hunter eine exklusive Soiree in seinem Anwesen.

translation.en: It happens to be this Saturday night.
[sighs] Well, I assume security will be tight as a drum.
translation.de: Dort gibt es vermutlich jede Menge Security.

translation.en: -Oh. -[Peter] It will be, but there'll also be people coming and going,
translation.de: Ja, aber viele Leute kommen und gehen:

translation.en: caterers, florists, guests, which affords us the perfect opportunity.
translation.de: Gastronomen, Floristen, Gäste. Eine perfekte Gelegenheit für uns.

translation.en: All we have to do is make sure Hunter is occupied,
translation.de: Wir müssen Hunter bloß beschäftigt halten.

translation.en: and lucky for us, he used to be quite enamored of Fiona.
translation.de: Und zum Glück ist er sehr von Fiona angetan.

translation.en: Oh! So, uh, this bad boy had a thing for you, huh?
translation.de: Dieser Bad Boy stand also auf dich?

translation.en: Oh, we had a bit of a steamy. [chuckles] But he wasn't my type.
translation.de: Da lief mal kurz was, aber er war nicht mein Typ.

translation.en: So, when was the last time you spoke to this Mr. Cunard?
translation.de: Wann hast du zuletzt mit diesem Mr. Cunard gesprochen?

translation.en: [scoffs] A few years ago. We both moved on.
translation.de: Vor ein paar Jahren. Das Leben geht weiter.

translation.en: If it's been years, how are you gonna get invited to the party?
translation.de: Und wie willst du dann zur Party eingeladen werden?

translation.en: Hunter walks his dog through the park behind the library
translation.de: Hunter geht mit seinem Hund im Park spazieren.

translation.en: every morning at 8:00 a.m., rain or shine.
translation.de: Jeden Morgen um acht, egal bei welchem Wetter.

translation.en: Fiona will do the same.
I'm certain once they coincidentally run into each other, she can charm an invitation out of him.
translation.de: Und wenn sie sich zufällig treffen, kann sie eine Einladung ergattern.

translation.en: Where is she gonna get a dog?
translation.de: Wo bekommt sie einen Hund her?

translation.en: Hm, I can pinch her a pooch.
Forgive me, but aren't you the Peter Maxwell who worked for Interpol
translation.de: Verzeihung, bist du nicht Peter Maxwell von Interpol,

translation.en: and was, well, charged with a rather large-scale diamond theft?
translation.de: der wegen eines Diamantraubs angeklagt wurde?

translation.en: The charges were dismissed, but the incident tarnished my reputation,
translation.de: Die Anklage wurde fallengelassen, doch mein Ruf war geschädigt,

translation.en: so I resigned and started my own private security firm, which has proven quite lucrative.
translation.de: also trat ich zurück und gründete meine eigene Security-Firma.

translation.en: Mm-hmm. So what's your finder's fee?
-There is no fee. -Why not?
Let's just say… I have my reasons.
[exhales] This isn't a dog. It's bloody Big Foot.
translation.de: Das ist kein Hund. Das ist Bigfoot.

One, two, three, four.
One, two, three. You're starting to get the hang of it.

[Fiona] Now, swing those hips.

I told him I wanted to sell Pembroke.

I might need to brush up. [chuckles]

May I?
It's like this.
If I could please have everyone's attention.
May I present Fiona Pembroke.
And Fiona Pembroke.
[exhales] Any thoughts?
[hesitates] It's amazing.
And a bit unsettling.
I know exactly how you feel.

translation.en: -I'll do the hair once you're in the gown. -I'll go change.

translation.en: -I think this might work. [laughs] -[Margaret] Mm.
-All right then. Let's get the van ready. -Right.
translation.de: -Alles klar. Bereiten wir den Van vor. -Ja.

Has it ever occurred to you that every time you start to feel something for someone, you pull away?

Admit it, Pemmie. You didn't leave because you had feelings for Hunter.

translation.en: Is that what you really think?
What I really think is that you're so hurt by what happened to you when we were kids,

translation.en: I'm nothing like her.
-I'm sorry, Fiona. I didn't mean-- -No, you meant every word.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid, so meinte ich das nicht. -Oh doch.

Fine.
Business it is.
Van's ready.
[Peter] Brilliant.

Be ready to go.
Pete, I can show you how it's done. It's a button and a twisty-twisty.

Hey, wait up, Pete. Pete!
I call shotgun.
-You can't call shotgun. -[chuckles] Why not?

I'm fine. I'm fine.
[Margaret] Wish me luck.
[Stacy] Good luck.
Just keep Hunter entertained, and everything will be fine.

I hope Margaret can carry this off.
Well, she pulled off being me. Remember?

Your Highness, if it's discovered Ms. Pembroke isn't here,

The committee, well, they may recommend a jail sentence.

Okay, okay. I'll… I'll see what I can do. Bye.

translation.en: No.
Well, maybe…
No, no, no, no. I know what you're thinking. And no. Absolutely not. It's out of the question.

Then I'm going with you.
We're a team. Remember?
Go, team. [laughs]
[man] Good evening, ma'am.
How on earth does she walk in these things?

translation.en: [sighs] Dear me.
[man] Sector one, sector two. You're good.

-You shush! -Shh.
What do you think?
Absolutely terrifying.
Let's go.
Okay.
[man 1] There you are, miss.

Meow. [chuckles]
-Hm. -Ma chérie.
-I'm so glad that you could make it. -Oh, how could I resist one of these?

I would love to see your tree. [chuckles]
The Star of Peace.
Right where you said it would be. Let's go.

translation.en: -[sighs] Okay. -[Reggie] Santa to Rudolph. Come in, Rudolph. Rudolph, do you read me?

-Why not? -Because they're stupid.
-Now would you let me concentrate? -[Reggie] Ooh!
Well, there's no need to take that tone.
What's new?
Not a bloody thing.
So, you never did tell me if you're still in touch with that Peter Maxwell.

Wait here.
Oh dear lord!
-The keypad was supposed to be here. -[sighs]

Get out of my sight.
-Now. -[glasses clink]
-[sighs] -That was uncomfortably close.

translation.en: No idea.
-Are you okay? -[Edward] Well, more or less.

Ms. Pembroke. [chuckles nervously] There you are.

Prince Edward of Belgravia.

Based on the testimony of your character witness

[hesitates] Of course we will miss you terribly.

-[chuckles] -Yes.

Take this.

Me and Frankie boy, we're getting out while the getting's good.

Okay, I'm coming.
Oh God.
Hey, hey, hey!
Let's go.
Stay here.

-[man 1] Check on that room! -They're coming. Take it.

Alpha team to the east exit.

-[man yells indistinctly] -[Reggie whimpers]

translation.en: [laughs] That feels much better.
[screams] You're all fired! Do you hear me?

-Oh! What are you doing? -[Mindy groans]

-I will save you. -[man] Don't let them get away!

-Right there! Right there! -Get it!
-I'll call the police. -No.
No police, idiot.

There you are. -We were so worried about you. -Zsst.

Well, we still haven't heard from him, so we don't know.

Of course we did, royal worrywart.
[Margaret] Uh, Fiona.

translation.de: -Er hat ihn ausgetauscht. -Also hat Peter den Stern.

After everything we went through? I can't believe it.

Fiona, you can't feel bad about this.

Well, then whose fault is it?
-We're back! Merry Chri-- -We're back!
What the… Who the…

-And that's Margaret? -Mm-hmm.

[exhales] Okay. It's you.

"Saint Nicholas's Star of Peace gone forever."

You're done.

You're as free as a bird.

translation.de: -Morgen geht ein Flug nach Capri. -Nach dem Frühstück.

-Yes! -Joyeux Noel, mes amours.
-Hello, dear. -Hello. [chuckles]
Mummy, Mummy, Mummy!

translation.en: [boy] Merry Christmas!
I hated school. Skipped most of it.

Hey, Fifi, where you going?

I needed to get your attention.
[scoffs] I want the Star.
And you'll get it.

She wants to talk to you.
How dare you tell me what to do?

translation.en: More or less.
Do you want to give me what I came here for?

translation.en: Or shall I call the police and have you arrested?
translation.de: Oder soll ich die Polizei rufen?

translation.en: I know I said I'd always be there for you, Pemmie,
translation.de: Ich sagte, ich würde immer für dich da sein,

translation.en: but this is the end of the line for us.
translation.de: aber das hier ist das Ende für uns.

translation.en: That's a relief.
Hello, Mummy.
I didn't think you'd come.
I wasn't going to,
but Peter said you wanted to speak to me, so go ahead.
translation.de: aber Peter sagte, du wolltest mit mir reden, also bitte.

translation.en: Speak.
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, does it?
translation.de: Der Apfel fällt nicht weit vom Stamm.

translation.en: Is that what you've waited all these years to tell me?
translation.de: Hast du so lange gewartet, nur um mir das zu sagen?

translation.en: Fiona darling, we can't go on like this.
translation.de: Fiona, Schatz, so geht das nicht weiter.

translation.en: Oh, I don't see why not.
You know, I've spent the last few years traveling the world
translation.de: Ich bin die letzten Jahre um die Welt gereist,

translation.en: trying to find some inner peace.
Eat, Pray, Love. It's so last decade.
translation.de: Eat, Pray, Love. Das ist total out.

translation.en: [Bianca] That may be.
But it was on a retreat at an ashram in Rishikesh
translation.de: Aber in einem Aschram in Rishikesh

translation.en: that I finally realized that there has been a void in my life.
translation.de: wurde mir klar, dass es eine Leere in meinem Leben gibt.

translation.en: Something missing.
And it's my daughter.
Fiona. Fiona…
I love you more than anything or anyone.
I always have.
Do you have any idea what it was like
translation.de: Weißt du, wie es sich angefühlt hat,

translation.en: trying to be good enough to be noticed by you?
translation.de: genug sein zu wollen, um von dir bemerkt zu werden?

translation.en: Trying to be good enough to matter to you?
Better than you think.
Oh no, that is a lie.
You always had somewhere else you had to be.
You always had a plane to catch.
I was running away.
-[scoffs] -No, not from you.
Never from you.
Your father was…
Your father was cruel to me,
translation.de: Dein Vater war grausam zu mir.

translation.en: and rather than suffer it,
I did whatever I could to get as far away from him as possible.
translation.de: tat ich alles, um von ihm wegzukommen.

translation.en: Oh, so you're here to make excuses.
translation.de: Du bist also hier, um dich rauszureden.

translation.en: No, there's… there's no excuse for what I did.
You're damned right there isn't.
I've carried this around for years.
translation.de: Die habe ich seit Jahren bei mir.

translation.en: Do you remember?
You gave it to me when you were ten. [chuckles]
translation.de: Du hast sie mir mit zehn gegeben.

translation.en: When I was here, I used to steal little trinkets,
translation.de: Damals habe ich hier immer Dinge gestohlen und sie eingepackt,

translation.en: wrap them up so that on Christmas, I could open them and pretend they were from you.
translation.de: damit ich sie an Weihnachten auspacken und so tun konnte, als wären sie von dir.

translation.en: I loved you so much, and I tried.
translation.de: Ich habe dich so geliebt und mich so sehr bemüht…

translation.en: I tried so hard not to care that I wasn't worthy of being loved back.
translation.de: Ich habe mich so sehr bemüht zu vergessen, dass ich nicht geliebt wurde.

translation.en: Oh, Fiona, you wonderful, perfect little girl. I…
I was a wretched mother,
and even though I don't deserve it,
translation.de: Und obwohl ich es nicht verdiene,

translation.en: I'm… I'm hoping that you can find it in your heart to forgive me.
translation.de: hoffe ich, dass du mir vergeben kannst.

translation.en: Please, darling. Just give me a second chance.
translation.de: Bitte, Liebling. Gib mir eine zweite Chance.

translation.en: Well, who knows how many Christmases we have left, you and I?
translation.de: Wer weiß, wie viele Weihnachten wir noch haben?

translation.en: It's too late.
[sobs] Fiona.
♪ You've been on my mind ♪ ♪ On my mind ♪
Hey! Come on, Fifi!
We've got a plane to catch.
Fifi.
-What? -[Reggie] Where you going? Come back!
Come back! We've got a flight to catch!
-[Reggie] What you doing? We've got to go! -Come back! We can't drive this!
translation.de: -Wir müssen los! -Wir können das nicht fahren!

translation.en: [Bianca] Oh, darling.
Shh, shh. It's okay. It's okay. -♪ Home is where the love is ♪ -It's okay. [chuckles]
Hey, everything is gonna be okay. I promise.
Right this way, please.
Cardinal Amoah, Inspector Moretti,
so good of you to come on such short notice.
Your message said it was urgent.
[exhales] I'm feeling a little bit queasy.
Please take a seat.
I do hope everything is all right.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, alles ist in Ordnung.

translation.en: -Um-- -It isn't all right. -[sighs] -It's fabulous, darling.
translation.de: Es ist nicht in Ordnung. Es ist fabelhaft, Liebling.

translation.en: We gave the old thing a bit of a polish.
I do hope you don't mind, Your Eminence.
Mind? It looks spectacular. Gratias ago Deo.
translation.de: Er sieht spektakulär aus. Gratias ago Deo.

translation.en: Hm? Botticelli, Versace.
Aw, Auntie Bianca, what a pleasure to see you again.
translation.de: Tante Bianca, wie schön, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: -Pleasure to be seen. -[chuckles] [chuckling] And who do we have here?
translation.de: Freut mich, hier zu sein. Und wen haben wir hier?

translation.en: Mummy, please.
So, will the two of you be staying with us for Christmas?
translation.de: Bleibt ihr beide über Weihnachten bei uns?

translation.en: [exhales] Well, if it's all right with Maggie Moo.
All right?
[scoffs] We'd be delighted to have you. You're family.
translation.de: Wir würden uns sehr freuen. Ihr gehört zur Familie.

translation.en: I suppose we are.
[Stacy] Um, Fiona?
I know you and I don't have that much in common,
really anything in common.
I just want to say I'm really grateful for all you've done.
translation.de: Aber ich bin sehr dankbar für alles, was du getan hast.

translation.en: -You could have just disappeared. -Oh, I've actually given up disappearing.
translation.de: Du hättest einfach verschwinden können. Damit habe ich aufgehört.

translation.en: Glad to hear it.
By the way, how did you convince Peter to give you back the Star?
translation.de: Wie hast du Peter überzeugt, dir den Stern zurückzugeben?

translation.en: Oh yeah.
He intended to, all along.
translation.de: Er wollte es die ganze Zeit.

translation.en: So does that mean he'll be joining us for Christmas?
translation.de: Also ist er an Weihnachten auch hier?

translation.en: Peter and I decided to go our separate ways.
translation.de: Peter und ich gehen nun getrennte Wege.

translation.en: [Stacy] Oh no.
I'm so sorry.
Don't be. It's for the best.
translation.de: Muss es nicht. Es ist besser so.

translation.en: I think you need a hug.
Please, no.
No… There it is.
Hey, my family is from the Philippines. We do hugs.
translation.de: Meine Familie kommt von den Philippinen. Wir umarmen uns.

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop, the reindeer pause ♪
translation.de: Oben auf dem Dach halten die Rentiere

translation.en: ♪ Out jumps good ol' Santa Claus ♪
translation.de: Heraus springt Der gute alte Weihnachtsmann

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With lots of toys ♪
translation.de: Durch den Schornstein mit viel Spielzeug

translation.en: ♪ All for the little ones Christmas joys ♪
-♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪ -[woman yodels]
translation.de: Ho, ho, ho! Wer würde nicht gehen?

translation.en: ♪ Ho, ho, ho! Who wouldn't go? ♪
translation.de: Ho, ho, ho! Wer würde nicht gehen?

translation.en: ♪ Up on the housetop Click, click, click ♪
translation.de: Oben auf dem Dach, klick, klick, klick

translation.en: ♪ Down through the chimney With good Saint Nick ♪
translation.de: Durch den Schornstein Mit dem guten Weihnachtsmann

translation.en: After all we went through, it's a miracle this came together.
translation.de: Nach allem, was passiert ist, ist das hier ein Wunder.

translation.en: Ah, I knew it would.
You didn't tell me what happened to Hunter Cunard.
translation.de: Aber was ist mit Hunter Cunard?

translation.en: Oh, the police arrested him last night trying to flee the country.
translation.de: Die Polizei nahm ihn fest, als er das Land verlassen wollte.

translation.en: Guessing he's gonna spend a long time in jail.
translation.de: Er wird wohl einige Zeit sitzen.

translation.en: Well, deservedly so.
I gave them the diamond bracelet as well.
translation.de: Das Armband gab ich ihnen auch.

translation.en: Did you happen to keep those red heels?
I couldn't be more proud of you and Queen Margaret, of course,
translation.de: Ich könnte nicht stolzer auf dich und Königin Margaret sein

translation.en: for putting together a beautiful event like this.
Well, I couldn't have done it without you.
Well, I dare say we make a great team.
translation.de: Wir sind nun mal ein tolles Team.

translation.en: Just like that dashing chap who dresses up like a bat
and his, uh, beautiful catlike companion.
[laughs] Babe, Batman and Catwoman aren't a team.
translation.de: Batman und Catwoman sind kein Team.

translation.en: Of course they are.
I love you.
[chuckles] Cheers, darling.
You know, this is the best Christmas I have ever had.
translation.de: Das ist das beste Weihnachten, das ich je hatte.

translation.en: Oh, because someone spiked the eggnog?
No, it's because I have my beautiful daughter back.
translation.de: Weil ich meine wundervolle Tochter zurückhabe.

translation.en: So, is this how it's going to be between us?
translation.de: So ist unsere Beziehung jetzt also?

translation.en: All gooey and sentimental?
Mm-hmm. Oh yeah. Come here.
Merry Christmas, darling.
Merry Christmas, Mummy.
Love you.
Guru Adishankar, it's so lovely to see you.
translation.de: Guru Adishankar, schön, dich zu sehen.

translation.en: [laughing] I'm so happy!
-I'm so glad we're together. -Oh my!
-Look at this guy! -[laughs]
You! You look bangin', bro.
[Mindy] Well, hello, Mr. Handsome.
[Peter] Talk about clichés.
Beautiful woman, alone on Christmas, gazing up at the night sky.
translation.de: Eine schöne Frau, allein an Weihnachten, blickt hoch in den Nachthimmel.

translation.en: Hm. I expected better from you.
I didn't think I'd see you again.
translation.de: Mit dir hätte ich nicht gerechnet.

translation.en: I was mad at you, Pemmie,
because you didn't care about me as much as I cared about you.
translation.de: weil ich dir nicht so wichtig war wie du mir.

translation.en: And that's not a good reason to be mad at someone, so…
translation.de: Das ist kein guter Grund, wütend auf jemanden zu sein…

translation.en: so I came back to apologize.
It's my turn to apologize.
You were right.
I do shut people out. It's always felt safer that way.
translation.de: Ich lasse Leute nicht an mich ran. So fühle ich mich sicherer.

translation.en: But now?
It's what Mummy said.
We never know how much time we have left with the people we care about.
translation.de: Wir wissen nie, wie viel Zeit wir mit denen haben, die uns wichtig sind.

translation.en: [sighs] And we can't waste it.
Promise me you and I won't waste any more time.
translation.de: Versprich mir, dass wir keine Zeit mehr verschwenden.

translation.en: I promise.
Swear.
No matter what.
No matter where.
Ladies and gentlemen,
before we light our tree,
we just wanted to say how happy and grateful we are
translation.de: möchten wir uns bei euch bedanken,

translation.en: that you all are here tonight.
And our greatest hope is that the Christmas spirit of goodwill and love
translation.de: Unsere größte Hoffnung ist, dass der gute Wille und die Liebe

translation.en: fill the world and shine as brightly as the Star of Peace.
translation.de: die Welt erfüllen und so hell erstrahlen wie der Stern des Friedens.

translation.en: So without further ado, Princess Olivia, will you do the honors?
translation.de: Ohne weitere Umschweife: Prinzessin Olivia, wenn ich bitten darf.

translation.en: ♪ Deck the halls with boughs of holly ♪
♪ 'Tis the season to be jolly ♪
translation.de: Es ist die Jahreszeit, um fröhlich zu sein

translation.en: ♪ Don we now our gay apparel ♪
Oh my God! Phew!
